school_name: University of Texas at San Antonio
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Goes really fast in lectures but he has really good information. He uses powerpoints but he cant keep his train of thought, he really relies on the powerpoint although I know he can give the information without it. Good demonstrations and very friendly. Attendance only matters when there is a lab that needs to be done.

school_name: University of Texas at San Antonio
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Classes not long, 3 tests can replace with a paper for the one of the first two. Not comprehensive tests but tells you what is good to remember from the lectures so go to class or you have to really study everything. Tests are pretty easy, multiple choice, fill in the blank w word bank, label diagrams. Great teacher would definitely take again.

school_name: University of Texas at San Antonio
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: his test are tough. you have to study. no papers or projects just test. he does post powerpoints. he is upbeat and very into his field. no study guide for test though and doesn\'t give specifics on what to study exactly leading a lot of studying because material is a lot.

school_name: University of Texas at San Antonio
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Attendance not taken but gives unannounced labs worth 100 pts No book req but sometimes you get 40+ ppt slides in one class so test material covers 200 slides with no study guide just have to memorize it all. tests are mc,tf, fill in (gives a word bank) short answer. thought it would be more hands on. would not recommend

school_name: University of Texas at San Antonio
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Great instructor. Some material was a bit complicated but he made it easier to understand. Labs were fairly simple. There was no study guide for any exams, but he gave good hints during lecture so I recommend attending class. Final exam was the trickiest but it\'s not impossible. Study the pp slides well & you\'ll do great.

school_name: University of Texas at San Antonio
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: I took him about a year and half ago and I absolutely LOVED him. He made a class that I was already very interested in so much better. He is hilarious and seemed to be very passionate about his work. He\'s very approachable and wrote me a great recommendation letter when I needed it. Pure awesomesauce.

school_name: University of Texas at San Antonio
tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Tough Grader (2)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Reat is da bomb diggidy! Fun class, but beware of the last exam. It\'s a kick to the pants.
